name: Marcus Chen
bio: Award-winning director with 15+ years in music video production, specializing in alternative and indie rock visuals. Known for surrealist narratives with experimental techniques that push creative boundaries.
experience: Award-winning director with 15+ years in music video production

visual_style.description: Surrealist narratives with experimental techniques, dreamlike visuals, symbolic storytelling, organic textures

camera_preferences.shot_composition: Centered symmetrical framing, lots of negative space, rule of thirds with breathing room
camera_preferences.camera_notes: Prefers locked-off tripod shots, slow deliberate movements, symmetrical compositions

key_techniques: Soft key light with minimal fill
lighting_style.mood_lighting: Soft, naturalistic, warm tones, embracing darkness and shadows

editing_style.pace: Contemplative with bursts of energy during choruses
editing_style.rhythm_approach: Cuts match emotional beats rather than strict rhythm, builds tension with longer holds

storytelling.narrative_approach: Abstract storytelling with symbolic elements, surrealist narratives that require interpretation
storytelling.symbolism_level: High - uses metaphors, symbolic objects, and visual poetry

post_production.color_grading_style: Film emulation, desaturated with warm lift in shadows, vintage look
post_production.vfx_approach: Practical effects strongly preferred, uses in-camera techniques, minimal digital VFX
